data.title: Peter Masterson on LinkedIn: Making it Happen requires quite the team. And believe me
data.meta_description:
Making it Happen requires quite the team. 
And believe me - we’ve got quite the team here.

Good Morning and Happy Monday! It has been so rainy lately, So here is a random fact about rain. Did you know larger raindrops can fall as fast as 20 mph, while smaller raindrops can take up to 7 Minutes to fall. #APV #APVFreight #APVFreightSolutions #FreightBroker #Freight #Logistics #Transportation #Carriers #Shippers #Brokers #FamilyOwned #VeteranOwned #Business #SocialMediaMarketing #SocialMedia

Jacksonville, Florida-based Raven Transport Holding Inc. said it is shutting down its over-the-road and dedicated fleets, according to a Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification filing on Wednesday. The closure of the two fleets will result in 83 laid-off employees, including 57 truck drivers, from Raven’s facility at 7150 Phillips Highway in Jacksonville. Officials for Raven Transport did not provide a reason for shutting down the OTR and dedicated fleets but said the closure is permanent. Raven Transport did not immediately respond to a request for comment from FreightWaves. By Noi Mahoney #transportes #aduanas #transportación #customs #customsrequirements #logistics #supplychain #logística #freight #logisticsnews #customsnews

Peak Season is here for your business and Yard Truck issues can happen at any time. It is not just the downtime, but the cost of repair and maintenance that can be a burden on your operations. At BTR, we are focused on keeping your operations running smoothly. BTR offers flexible rental options, so you can rent for as long or as short a period as you need. You can rest assured that your business will keep moving forward, even if there is a breakdown. We will handle the repair and maintenance, so you can focus on what matters most to your business. #yardtruck #spotter #shifter #terminaltractor #yarddog #logistics #transportation #foodandbeverageindustry #transportation #distribution #freight #facilitymanagement #btr #autocar #switcher #yardgoats #yardmule #warehouse #warehousemanagement #peakseason #holidayseason #dependable #flexible #reliable
